name: WP Courseware addon for Restrict Content Pro
author: Fly Plugins

sections.description:
Fly Plugins presents Restrict Content Pro for WP Courseware.

Would you like to sell an online course with Restrict Content Pro?

The Restrict Content Pro Addon for WP Courseware will add full integration with WP Courseware. Simply assign WP Courseware course(s) to an RCP membership level. When a student purchases the membership level, they will automatically be enrolled into the associated course(s).

With this addon, you will be able to create a fully automated Learning Management System and sell online courses.

How does the Restrict Content Pro plugin integration work with WP Courseware?

Basic Configuration Steps

  1. Create a course with WP Courseware and add module(s), unit(s), and quiz(zes)
  2. Create a course outline page using [shortcode]
  3. Create a membership level and set a price
  4. Associate one or more WP Courseware courses with the membership level
  5. New student pays for the memberhip level, and WP Courseware enrolls them to the appropriate course(s) based on the purchased memberhip level

Check out Fly Plugins

For more tools and resources for selling online courses check out:

  • WP Courseware – The leading learning management system for WordPress. Create and sell online courses with a drag and drop interface. It’s that easy!
  • S3 Media Maestro – The most secure HTML 5 media player plugin for WordPress with full AWS (Amazon Web Services) S3 and CloudFront integration.

Follow Fly Plugins

  • Facebook
  • YouTube
  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • LinkedIn

Disclaimer

This plugin is only the integration, or “middle-man” between WP Courseware and Restrict Content Pro.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the Restrict Content Pro for WP Courseware addon folder into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does this plugin require WP Courseware to already be installed

Yes!

Does this plugin require Restrict Content Pro to already be installed

Yes!

Where can I get WP Courseware?

WP Courseware

Where can I get Restrict Content Pro?

Restrict Content Pro. We think it’s pretty rad!

screenshots.caption: The Course Access Settings screen will display the courses associated with membership levels

This is the screen where specific courses are selected to be associated with the membership level. The retroactive function will enroll students to courses that were recently associated to the membership level.
